name: My Micro Addiction
description:
You are browsing the internet on your computer when, suddenly, microtransactions attack! Your wallet only has $100 and you must absolutely not spend it on worthless, useless, ridiculous things such as game skins.... Can you protect your wallet from the attack of addicting enemies such as Rito Gaems and Stom?

- Made during GMTK Game Jam 2020. Theme was "Out Of Control".
